about_the_game:
Take down the competition with the Post Malone & Friends Pack, featuring the 9-time Diamond-certified artist and a host of notable WWE Superstars and Legends. Make a splash with WWE Hall of Famer Sensational Sherri, unleash the head-banging duo of Mosh and Thrasher, and deliver a little “Shake, Rattle, and Roll” with the Honky Tonk Man and his manager “The Mouth of the South,” Jimmy Hart. The Post Malone & Friends Pack also includes a special MyFACTION Manager card for Hart.

Each playable Superstar also comes with their own MyFACTION card.

The Post Malone & Friends Pack is already included with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass.
detailed_description:
Take down the competition with the Post Malone & Friends Pack, featuring the 9-time Diamond-certified artist and a host of notable WWE Superstars and Legends. Make a splash with WWE Hall of Famer Sensational Sherri, unleash the head-banging duo of Mosh and Thrasher, and deliver a little “Shake, Rattle, and Roll” with the Honky Tonk Man and his manager “The Mouth of the South,” Jimmy Hart. The Post Malone & Friends Pack also includes a special MyFACTION Manager card for Hart.

Each playable Superstar also comes with their own MyFACTION card.

The Post Malone & Friends Pack is already included with the WWE 2K24 Season Pass.
